## quatFromAxisAngle variable

Computes a quaternion representing the rotation `theta` around `axis`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
quatFromAxisAngle: (axis: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, theta: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
